items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: Address proof is available with utility bill issued by London City Utilities.
Annual accounts and Ellipro scores for 2020–2022 are available.
Bank and postal details are verified with available bank account and SWIFT code.
No specific details or directorship data is available in the annual report.
No information about tax documentation is included in the annual report.
Regulatory compliance information is available with medium to high risk levels.
Comprehensive details about financial services, operations, and corporate responsibility are available.
PEP screening data is available, highlighting risks associated with influential individuals.
Total net revenue of 158.1 billion dollars for the year ended December 31, 2023 is reported.
Market capitalization as of December 31, 2023 is reported as 489,320 million dollars.
